SelectAll: SELECT g.GoalKey, sc.SubcategoryName AS `GoalName`, g.GoalAmount, g.EstimatedCompletionDate, g.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimSubcategory sc INNER JOIN dimGoal g ON sc.GoalKey = g.GoalKey
UpdateRow: UPDATE dimGoal g SET g.GoalAmount = ?, g.EstimatedCompletionDate = ?, g.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE g.GoalKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimGoal (GoalKey, GoalAmount, EstimatedCompletionDate, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT g.GoalKey, g.GoalAmount, g.EstimatedCompletionDate, g.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimGoal g WHERE g.GoalKey = ?
